Holy Cipher

In this challenge you must find the name hidden within in the text written on the two stone tablets found in the Ark of The Covenant. The Stones have the 10 comandments written by the fingre ofthis God.This can be found in Bible verses:Deuteronomy 5:1-22. His name can only be seen when his glorious light shines upon the Sacred text!

The 10 Commandments

You shall have no other gods before Me .
You shall not make idols.
You shall not take the name of the LORD your God in vain.
Remember the Sabbath day, to keep it holy.
Honor your father and your mother.
You shall not murder.
You shall not commit adultery.
You shall not steal.
You shall not bear false witness against your neighbor.
You shall not covet.
